mapper.select: SELECT * FROM iclass, exercise_kind, exercise_date WHERE iclass.class_id = exercise_date.class_id and iclass.class_id = exercise_kind.class_id and user_id = #{userId} and CLASS_ENDDATE >= sysdate order by exercise_date.exercise_date desc

SELECT * FROM iclass, exercise_kind, exercise_date WHERE iclass.class_id = exercise_date.class_id and iclass.class_id = exercise_kind.class_id and user_id = #{userId} and CLASS_ENDDATE < sysdate order by exercise_date.exercise_date desc
SELECT count(*) FROM iclass WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cl.*, ca.category_name FROM iclass cl, category ca WHERE cl.category_id = ca.category_id ORDER BY cl.class_like DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 5 and category_id = 1 and class_enddate >= sysdate

SELECT ic.*, e.exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind e, ( SELECT c.*, iu.user_nickname FROM ( SELECT cl.*, ca.category_name FROM iclass cl, category ca WHERE cl.category_id = ca.category_id ORDER BY cl.class_like DESC ) c, iuser iu WHERE rownum <= 5 and category_id = 2 and class_state = 'show' and c.user_id = iu.user_id ) ic WHERE ic.class_id = e.class_id

SELECT c.*, e.exercise_kind FROM exercise_kind e, ( SELECT class_title, class_like, class_id FROM iclass, category WHERE iclass.category_id = category.category_id and iclass.category_id = 9 and rownum <= 5 ORDER BY class_like DESC ) c WHERE c.class_id = e.class_id
select count(*) from iClass where user_id = #{userId} and CLASS_ENDDATE >= sysdate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, c.* FROM ( SELECT B.* FROM iclass B WHERE B.user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id = 2 and CLASS_ENDDATE >= sysdate ORDER BY B.class_id DESC, B.class_startdate DESC ) C WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from iClass where user_id = #{userId} and CLASS_ENDDATE < sysdate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, c.* FROM ( SELECT B.* FROM iclass B WHERE user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id = 2 and CLASS_ENDDATE < sysdate ORDER BY B.class_startdate DESC ) C WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}
select * from exercise_date where class_id in (SELECT class_id FROM iclass WHERE user_id = #{userId}) order by class_id
select * from exercise_kind where class_id in (SELECT class_id FROM iclass WHERE user_id = #{userId}) order by class_id
